page.title: 07Petworth Churches
page.content: St.Mary,s Parish Church in Church St. Rector and Rural Dean:rev.J.H.Greene. Assistant Clergy:Rev.C.G.Furnivall.Rev.W.W.Heath . The organ is to be reconstructed at a cost of Â£35,000. First record of a rector was in 1238. United Reformed Church in Golden Square. Founded 1740. Present building 1889. Ministers: Rev.D.H.Bending, Rev. D.J.Morrill. Ebenezer Strict Baptist Chapel in Park Road by wall to Petworth House 1887. Petworth Christian Fellowship: their centre in Lombard St. is a coffee shop called "The Lamp". On a Sunday they meet at the Herbert Shiner School. Roman Catholic Church of the Sacred Heart in Angel St. Father:W.Timmons. The Chapel in Petworth House is only used for special occasions.
